Two notes on the Epivizr bioc2013 practical
===================================================================

The URL for part 1 exercise is [http://epiviz.cbcb.umd.edu/?workspace=0271BFB50384DE1DB4A3D712702D0E34](`http://epiviz.cbcb.umd.edu/?workspace=0271BFB50384DE1DB4A3D712702D0E34`).

```{r,eval=FALSE}

```
